category-def.name: edu.ufc.femtost.disc.sysml4modelica.topcased
category-def.label: UFC - SysML-Modelica Transformation for Topcased
category-def.description: Plugin which implements the OMG's specification SysML-Modelica Transformation V 1.0 Beta 3 2012-03-19. This plugin use ATL to perform model to model transformation and Accelo for code generation in the Topcased framework.
